title: Sound On: RIP Transitory Inflation, NDAA, Debt Deadline
itunes:title: Sound On: RIP Transitory Inflation, NDAA, Debt Deadline
description:
Guests: Republican Oklahoma Congressman Frank Lucas, Former Secretary of Defense for Middle East Policy in the George W. Bush administration, Retired Brigadier General Mark Kimmitt, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
